name: China
interestingFacts: The Great Wall of China is over 13,000 miles long.
China is the world's largest producer of rice.

name: India
interestingFacts: India is the birthplace of major religions, including Hinduism, Buddhism, and Sikhism.
The Taj Mahal, one of the Seven Wonders, is located in India.

name: United States
interestingFacts: The United States has the world's largest economy.
The Grand Canyon is over 277 miles long.

name: Indonesia
interestingFacts: Indonesia is made up of over 17,000 islands.
It has the world's largest Muslim population.

name: Pakistan
interestingFacts: Pakistan is home to one of the largest mountain ranges in the world, the Himalayas.
It is the world's sixth-most populous country.

name: Brazil
interestingFacts: The Amazon Rainforest, the world's largest tropical rainforest, is in Brazil.
Brazil is known for its Carnival festival.

name: Nigeria
interestingFacts: Nigeria is Africa's most populous country.
It is the world's largest producer of Nollywood films.

name: Bangladesh
interestingFacts: Bangladesh is one of the most densely populated countries in the world.
It has the longest sea beach in the world, Cox's Bazar.

name: Russia
interestingFacts: Russia is the largest country in the world by land area.
Lake Baikal in Russia is the deepest freshwater lake on Earth.

name: Mexico
interestingFacts: Mexico is home to the largest pyramid in the world, the Great Pyramid of Cholula.
It has 34 UNESCO World Heritage Sites, the most in the Americas.
